info.title: Signum Identity Platform API
info.description: Federated Identity Provider with Multi-Chain Attestation Bridging. Provides OAuth2/OIDC authentication, KYC verification, and unified chain identity management across Solana, EVM, and Canton networks.

get.description: Returns the service health status, version, and issuer URL

access_token.description: JWT access token for API authentication. Include in Authorization header.

refresh_token.description: Refresh token for obtaining new access tokens. Store securely.

post.description: Create a new user account and receive authentication tokens. Returns access token, refresh token, and user profile.

get.description: Retrieve the current KYC verification status for the authenticated user.

post.description: Start a new KYC verification process. Returns SDK token for client-side integration.
Generate a fresh access token for the KYC WebSDK. Used to resume verification.
Webhook endpoint for KYC provider callbacks. Validates signature and processes status updates.
Manually approve KYC verification in mock mode. Only available when KYC_PROVIDER=mock.
Manually reject KYC verification in mock mode. Only available when KYC_PROVIDER=mock.

get.description: Get information about the active KYC provider configuration.

post.description: Create a Program Derived Address (PDA) custody wallet for the user on Solana. The PDA is derived deterministically from the user's email hash.

get.description: Retrieve a unified view of all linked wallets and identities for the authenticated user across Solana, EVM, and Canton networks.

post.description: Create Privy embedded wallets for both EVM and Solana chains.

get.description: Retrieve user's Privy embedded wallet addresses.

post.description: Create a Canton Network party identity for the user.

get.description: Retrieve the user's Canton Network party identity.
Retrieve all EVM wallets linked to the user's account.

post.description: Generate a nonce and message for wallet ownership verification via signature.
Link an EVM wallet by verifying signature ownership.

delete.description: Remove an EVM wallet from the user's account.

get.description: Retrieve all Solana wallets including PDAs, embedded, and linked wallets.

post.description: Link an external Solana wallet to the user's account.

delete.description: Remove a Solana wallet from the user's account. PDA wallets cannot be unlinked.

get.description: Get a quick summary of user's chain presence across all networks.
